welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kelheim, where the stunning Danube River meets the charming Bavarian countryside! Get ready to be enchanted by our historic city known for its beautiful architecture, delicious cuisine, and rich culture. Explore, relax, and immerse yourself in all that Kelheim has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ingolstadt-manching Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Ingolstadt-manching Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wallmuhle Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional flights and low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name and password can be found on signs throughout the terminal.
